update.description:
update controller in drc_sim_v0

updated fire hose to 1 link only

made connectPose a parameter from `<coupling_relative_pose>`.

update screw joint limits.

renamed unpinned --> nominal, gravity --> no_gravity.

unset default threadPitch, awaiting next gazebo release.

fix fire hose plugin bug.

add controller for door hinge joint and handle hinge joint.

more updates to the drc robot model and building.
update.title: added more controller configurations.  implement/fix dynamic add / remove screw joint between coupling and standpipe via fire hose plugin.  Added door controller.

pull_request.title: added more controller configurations.  implement/fix dynamic add / remove screw joint between coupling and standpipe via fire hose plugin.  Added door controller.

content.raw: In `DRCRobotPlugin::SetPluginMode()`, some of those modes will be separate service calls, per our discussion today (e.g., grabbing the fire hose).
content.html: In DRCRobotPlugin::SetPluginMode(), some of those modes will be separate service calls, per our discussion today (e.g., grabbing the fire hose).

content.raw: In `DRCFirehosePlugin::AddJoint()`, does the code for setting the thread pitch on the joint only work with Gazebo 1.3.x?  If so, then we need to discuss the two release schedules and version compatibilities.
content.html: In DRCFirehosePlugin::AddJoint(), does the code for setting the thread pitch on the joint only work with Gazebo 1.3.x? If so, then we need to discuss the two release schedules and version compatibilities.

content.raw:
The diffs are too big for bitbucket's browser, so I'll comment here.  Starting with:

* In `DRCBuildingPlugin::Load()`, suggest checking for NULL returns from the `GetValueString()` calls before dereferencing them (e.g., `this->doorJoing`).
content.html:
The diffs are too big for bitbucket's browser, so I'll comment here. Starting with:

  • In DRCBuildingPlugin::Load(), suggest checking for NULL returns from the GetValueString() calls before dereferencing them (e.g., this->doorJoing).

content.raw:
to try:

get john branch in gazebo and drcsim.

start sim with:

~~~
gazebo fire_hose.world
~~~

change gravity to negative, and coupling should unscrew and fall off the standpipe.
content.html:
to try:

get john branch in gazebo and drcsim.

start sim with:

gazebo fire_hose.world

change gravity to negative, and coupling should unscrew and fall off the standpipe.
